si.title: දෙමළ පක්ෂ පළිගැනීම ද?
body_lines: "සෑම සිංහල නායකයෙකුම ඔවුන්ගේ අවශ්යතා සඳහා දෙමළ ජනයා අතර ඇති එකමුතුකම භාවිතා කර ඇති අතර ඒවා සිසිල් ය."

en.title: Will Tamil parties retaliate?
body_lines: “The unity among the Tamils ​​has been used for each of the Sinhalese leaders for their needs, and they are cool.”

summary_lines: Tamil political parties' reaction remains uncertain due to historical use of Tamil unity by Sinhalese leaders for personal gain, indicating a complex dynamic rather than immediate retaliation.
